comment_text:
I recommend watching Ira Glass's video on the gap between your taste and your abilities. He addresses your problem specifically because it's very common: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BI23U7U2aUY

You need to refocus your goals away from achievement and towards output. Learn to become motivated by effort rather than mastery because it will be a long time before you are top 10 at anything. Nobody stays motivated for that long without enjoying the work.
author: sgentle
story_title: Ask HN: I am giving up early on things I want to achieve.What is the way forward?
